Delete_Mod_Confirm_Message: Are you sure you want to delete the mod '{0}'? This will move the mod folder to the Recycle Bin.
LauncherNotFoundDescription: XXMI Launcher was not found. Please download and install it to launch the game.
Ntfs_Startup_Warning_Content: Mod management works on all file systems supported by Windows. However, the current disk or partition is not formatted as NTFS, which prevents the creation of symbolic links (symlinks) and thus mod activation. You can still select a mod library and XXMI target folder on an NTFS disk to enable mod activation.
Ntfs_Warning_Content: The selected folder for {0} ({1}) is not on an NTFS partition. This will prevent mod activation (symlinks).
Open_ModLibrary_Tooltip: Open the ModLibrary directory in Explorer
OptimizePreviews_Confirm_Message: This will optimize all mod preview images to 1000x1000 pixels. This process may take some time. Do you want to continue?
SettingsPage_GridLogging_Tooltip: Enable detailed logging for grid performance debugging
SettingsPage_ModGridZoom_Tooltip: Feature is half-bugged. Mouse scroll wheel may stop working, dragging scroll bar or using mouse wheel on scroll bar still works. That's WinUI 3 problem, couldn't fix this.
SettingsPage_DefaultResolutionOnStart_De: Use fixed window size instead of remembering last size
SettingsPage_DefaultStartResolution_Desc: Window dimensions when default resolution is enabled
SettingsPage_OptimizePreviews_Tooltip: Resizes preview images to 1000x1000 pixels, crops non-square images to square (middle), saves as high-quality JPG. Also creates small mini-tiles.
Welcome_SelectGame: Please select a game from the dropdown above to get started.
ViewModeToggle_CategoryMode_Tooltip: You are in category tiles mode
ActiveModsToTop_Tooltip: When enabled, active mods will be displayed at the top of the list
ShuffleActiveMods_NoCategories: No mod categories found for shuffling.
DeactivateAllMods_Message:
Deactivated {0} mods.

Mods in 'Other' category were preserved.
XXMI_Download_Instructions: After downloading, extract the XXMI folder to APP direvtory or update the XXMI Mods Directory path in Settings.
XXMI_Download_Required: XXMI Launcher is required to launch mods. Download the portable version from GitHub:
RenameDialog_InvalidName_Error: Invalid name. Please use only valid characters for folder names.
SettingsPage_Backdrop_Description: Select the background effect for the application
SettingsPage_OptimizePreviews_Descriptio: Optimize mod preview images for better performance
SettingsPage_ActiveModsToTop_Description: Move active mods to the top of the list
SettingsPage_DynamicModSearch_Descriptio: Enable real-time filtering as you type
SettingsPage_ShowOrangeAnimation_Descrip: Show decorative animation under the manager title
SettingsPage_ModGridZoom_Description: Enable zoom functionality for mod grid
SettingsPage_GridLogging_Description: Enable detailed logging for performance debugging
SettingsPage_MinimizeToTray_Description: Minimize the application to system tray instead of taskbar
SettingsPage_ReloadManagerHotkey_Descrip: Keyboard shortcut for reloading the manager
SettingsPage_ShuffleActiveModsHotkey_Des: Keyboard shortcut for shuffling active mods
SettingsPage_DeactivateAllModsHotkey_Des: Keyboard shortcut for deactivating all mods
